description: On BOYNAPPED DARK there is always something kinky and new happening. Our newest crew member LOVES feet so you can imagine how excited he was when  he found out our "victim", Alec hated anyone touching his feet.  Well we tied him down, we tickled him, we tortured him and finished it all off by spanking his arse until it was a nice bright red.
title: Alec Steele, Sebastian Kane & Steven
